basics.name: Shweta Khera
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.headline: I build lightning-fast, accessible web applications that delight users and scale to millions
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience designing, building, and optimising large-scale web and mobile applications using React, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frontend architecture. Strong track record delivering high-performance, accessible, mobile-responsive interfaces and leading code-quality initiatives.

experience.problem: Admin and desktop applications suffered from 60-second load times, inconsistent UI after Tailwind migration, and duplicated component code across platforms
experience.solution: Implemented strategic code splitting and lazy loading, established reusable design system patterns, and led architecture improvements across React/TypeScript/Electron stack
experience.impact: Reduced load time from 60s to 103ms (98% improvement), cut duplicate code by 32%, and established component patterns that improved team velocity
highlights: Reduced webpage load time from 60 seconds to 103 ms via code splitting and lazy loading (98% improvement)
Spearheaded reusable design-system initiative, cutting duplicate code by 32%
Led PR reviews and mentored junior engineers, establishing UI component patterns
Delivered cross-platform features including account deletion with end-to-end implementation
Resolved major UI inconsistencies after Tailwind theme migration

experience.problem: Legacy BI feature built in AngularJS was unmaintainable with 100K+ lines of code, slow build times, and manual dependency management causing delays
experience.solution: Rebuilt as standalone Angular library, migrated entire codebase from AngularJS to Angular 11+, integrated automated dependency management with Renovate
experience.impact: Modernized 100K+ LOC improving maintainability, reduced manual dependency effort by 50%, accelerated development with Storybook-driven workflows
highlights: Rebuilt legacy BI feature as standalone Angular library enabling data import, transformations, scheduling, and workflows
Migrated 100K+ LOC from AngularJS to Angular 11+, improving maintainability and reducing build times
Used Storybook to accelerate frontend development and showcase progress to product, design, and sales teams
Integrated Renovate to automate dependency upgrades, reducing manual effort by 50%
Delivered features using lean, iterative processes with frequent internal demos

experience.problem: Multiple clients needed production-ready React Native mobile applications with complex features like scheduling, payments, and real-time data
experience.solution: Built complete mobile applications using React Native with integrated maps, payment workflows, booking systems, and interactive calendars
experience.impact: Delivered 3 production mobile apps (Trook, Organic Laundry, FitHouse) serving real users with full feature sets and seamless UX
highlights: Developed chef-facing Trook app using React Native with scheduling, maps, earnings, and driver bookings
Built Organic Laundry mobile app with cart, order history, and payment workflows
Added interactive calendar features in FitHouse with daily/weekly/monthly views and API-driven rendering
Led team of 3 instructors for Swift BootCamp with 95% success rate
Delivered personalised instruction for small groups
Refined curriculum content across two core courses
Built Angular + Node.js admin dashboard with analytics and secure authentication
Designed polling feature using Ionic + Node.js with real-time graphical results

projects.name: Grant Align
projects.description: An AI-powered assistant for managing and drafting grant applications built with Next.js and TypeScript.

projects.name: PRX Vault Task
projects.description: A zero-knowledge secrets manager with client-side encryption

projects.name: Trook - Chef Management App
projects.description: A chef-facing mobile application for food delivery management. Features include scheduling, real-time mapping, earnings tracking, and driver booking coordination.

projects.name: Organic Laundry
projects.description: A full-featured laundry service booking app. Includes shopping cart, order history tracking, real-time updates, and integrated payment workflows.

projects.name: FitHouse
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking application with interactive calendar views for workout scheduling. Features daily, weekly, and monthly workout plans.

projects.name: Transformer-Based Forecasting Model
projects.description: Advanced time-series forecasting system for stock market predictions. Leverages attention mechanisms to capture temporal patterns.

projects.name: DSW
projects.description: Landing page design concept for a hypothetical AI company focused on human-centric automation.
Full-stack application showcasing event management and community features for a movie marathon club.

projects.name: Sjoon
projects.description: Concept web platform that allows users to access free photos without requiring account registration.

projects.name: Fun With GPT3
projects.description: Prototype app showcasing AI text generation by feeding user prompts to GPT-3 via API.

projects.name: Kbnb
projects.description: KBnB lets users register, list properties, browse and search for stays, and book accommodations—all with a responsive, user-friendly interface. The project features secure authentication, image uploads, and a seamless booking experience.
